titleInfo.title: 1937: Flood victims at Lawler School. Four of these children lost from parents.

mods.abstract: A group of children that are flood victims at Lawler School. It is indicated that four children are without their parents.

relatedItem.abstract: ...During the historic flooding event in mid-May, hundreds of Mid-Southerners flocked downtown to snap once-in-a-lifetime shots of Tom Lee Park and parts of Mud Island submerged in water. Now Ellery Ammons, a 17-year-old senior at St. Mary's Episcopal School, wants some of those shots for a 2011 flood photography archive she's spearheading for the Benjamin L. Hooks Central Library....
